@Laryn I figured out a combo to avoid the missing template MODULE.views.inc that happens with a views plugin. I can't recall what module it was. I ported https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/eva. Not sure if it needs to be exactly like this but I think having templates/MODULE.theme.inc and also adding theme file and/or theme path in hook_views_plugins.

backdrop-contrib/eva
Provides a Views display plugin that allows the output of a View to be attached to the content of any Backdrop entity. - backdrop-contrib/eva
